hibernate-mapping.query: select employee from Employee as employee left join fetch employee.user user left join fetch user.contactInfo contactInfo left join fetch user.personalRole personalRole left join fetch user.login login order by employee.user.contactInfo.lastName, employee.user.contactInfo.firstName asc

select employee from Employee as employee left join fetch employee.user user left join fetch employee.icompany icompany left join fetch user.contactInfo contactInfo where employee.igenerate is not null and employee.igenerate = true order by employee.icompany.code, employee.user.contactInfo.lastName, employee.user.contactInfo.firstName asc
